trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were 2 other sightings in Toronto on or around June 20th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn a way back home , I've stopped into a gallery & had a chat with the artist , than I asked if we could continue conversation on the outside (no other visitors were present at the time), my pretext was to have a smoke , but the truth is different & couldn't tell him at that time yet. Once we were outside by the back door , I took a camera & pointed it in the sky in the North to NE direction , at that moment he said "there's nothing there" , without looking at him I said "if you look you'll see them" , he seemed puzzled , but I took 2 photos of that area than 1 in the direction of ES. The first photo was taken at 1:11:21 PM , & although I didn't see anything , some strange 'structure' was visible , especially when brought out close & on full screen ! At first I thought it maybe shadows in the cloud creating such phenomena , but while in the full screen mode , I noticed 'ridges' on it plus above on the right side seem to be pointy triangular shapes. But the most outstanding is what looks like a 'vapor' coming-outgoing out of the middle of it ! The angle position is directed towards the lake . ( I'm aware our celestial co-brothers need of Hydrogen as one of the elements to power the ships , but this wasn't even above the water ! the lake is approx. 2 miles ? from where this thing was ). Also , the hot sun rays are consitant of illuminating this 'structure' in the sky . While I continued going through that 1st photo tiny frame by frame , there's way at the bottom of the photo & nearly directly below of this structure something else , although I cannot make out if it is an ufo ship or something entirely different . Prior to taking these photographs we both saw a sm. aircraft fly by clearly visible with motor noise a at much lower altitude . I'm attaching 3 photos . A close up of this strange shaped structure , the original photo & zoomed ufo perhaps . Couple hrs later I took additional photos of the sky in another direction with interesting domed disks shining near the sun , but unable to attach these here with the report . Needless to say I'm really puzzled & wondering in regard of this 1 st photo I took . Any ideas ?
Summary: I wonder what MUFON investigators think about this "structure" in the cloud?!
